name: The Tanukis' Trip
description:
Explore the forest, eat mushrooms to survive. Who know's what side effects will happen?

WASD to move

Right Click Mouse or Left Shift mouse to camera

Left click on mushrooms and they will be selected.

Use the pick action to eat one.

Source code :

https://github.com/jeremy-prater/side_effects

We definitely broke the wasm build. It starts up, but you just can't play it. :(

Attaching native builds in a zip

Using rust 1.68  you can just `cargo run --release` and it'll start right up

 -- Thanks to --

@Daruna_ for making the awesome music

@Spooky_Th_Ghost and @Flamingo for all the code help!

The journey was the experience, we get to share this cool game with the world.
